headline: Here’s What the Street is Saying About Amgen Inc. (AMGN)
summary: Amgen Inc. (NASDAQ:AMGN) is one of the best immunotherapy stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On February 12, Amgen Inc. headline: Wells Fargo Maintains Equal-Weight on Amgen, Raises Price Target to $375
summary: Wells Fargo  analyst Mohit Bansal   maintains Amgen (NASDAQ:AMGN) with a Equal-Weight and raises the price target from $325 to $375.
